Name: McPixel
About the game: McPixel is a save-the-day guy that you guide through 100 short challenges in an old-school point'n'click fashion. The goal in each challenge is to prevent stuff from blowing up using available tools! You have only 20 seconds to save the day! Think quick! Key features: 100 mindblowing levels Bonuses, secrets and more Free DLC for everyone! 185 BMP ear piercing music! Switchable pixel filters Level creator McPixel Fart Along McPixel Social Largest pixels on the market up to date! Save the day the McPixel way!
